text: But I tell you that anyone who is angry with his brother 5:22 BYZ and TR include without cause. will be subject to judgment. Again, anyone who says to his brother, ‘Raca,’5:22 Raca is an Aramaic expression of contempt. will be subject to the Sanhedrin.5:22 Or the Council But anyone who says, ‘You fool!’ will be subject to the fire of hell.5:22 Or the hell of fire; Greek the Gehenna of fire
